title: Auba: Heart 'absolutely fine' after lesions diagnosis at AFCON
shortDescription: Arsenal striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang says his "heart is absolutely fine" following health checks in London after being diagnosed with cardiac lesions at AFCON.

title: AFCON latest scores - Ivory Coast face Algeria
shortDescription: Catch up with all the scores from all Thursday's games with Algeria facing Ivory Coast in a crucial game in the Africa Cup of Nations...

title: Hibs considering third Saudi bid for Boyle
shortDescription: Hibernian are considering an improved third bid from Al-Faisaly for forward Martin Boyle.

title: How has Conte changed Spurs?
shortDescription: In-form Tottenham produced an epic win over Leicester and now face a blockbuster clash with Chelsea on Sunday - but what has changed under new boss Antonio Conte?

title: Man Utd prefer Lingard permanent deal | Newcastle still interested
shortDescription: Manchester United would prefer Jesse Lingard to leave permanently this month, with Newcastle still interested in signing the forward.

shortDescription: Listen to the latest episode and subscribe to the Essential Football Podcast from Sky Sports Football.

title: Key Scot Prem title race matches to be shown live on Sky
shortDescription: Four more Scottish Premiership matches involving the Old Firm have been added to Sky Sports' live schedule as the dramatic title race unfolds.

title: Bamford suffers fresh injury setback
shortDescription: Leeds boss Marcelo Bielsa has revealed striker Patrick Bamford has suffered a fresh setback in his bid to return to full fitness.

title: FIFA plans new loan rules | Clubs limited to six loan exits per season
shortDescription: FIFA has announced new loan rule plans that will limit clubs to six loan signings and six loan exits per season.

title: Watford vs Norwich on Sky: Hornets still without Sarr
shortDescription: Team news, stats and prediction ahead of Watford vs Norwich in the Premier League on Friday Night Football; kick-off 8pm.

title: Newcastle moving closer to Carlos deal but face PL competition
shortDescription: Newcastle are moving closer to a deal for Diego Carlos but still face competition to sign the Sevilla defender from another Premier League club.

title: Misogyny 'rife' on football message boards, study finds
shortDescription: Football fan message boards are rife with "openly misogynistic" attitudes towards women's sport among male supporters, according to new research.

title: Premier League player bailed again on child sex offences
shortDescription: A Premier League footballer arrested on suspicion of child sex offences has had his bail extended until April 17.

title: Continental Cup: Chelsea, Man City, Man Utd and Spurs reach semis
shortDescription: Four of the FA WSL's top five teams will contest the semi-finals of the Continental Cup with Man City, Man Utd, Tottenham and Chelsea all progressing.

title: Dembele set for Barca exit after contract snub
shortDescription: Ousmane Dembele has been told by Barcelona that he will be sold this month after he refused to sign a new contract at the Nou Camp.

title: Man Utd's Zidane Iqbal set for Iraq debut in Iran
shortDescription: Manchester United's Zidane Iqbal to get Iraq call-up and set for international debut away at rivals Iran as British South Asians in football make a flying start in 2022.
